Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
cliffhanger \cliffhanger\ n. a contest whose outcome is uncertain up to the very end. [WordNet 1.5]
2. an episode of a drama that ends in suspense. [WordNet 1.5]
cliffhanger n 1: a contest whose outcome is uncertain up to the very end 2: an episode that ends in suspense
